___AttrNames.description: The mapping between 0-based indices of attributes and their string names
___AttrNames.title: Names of attributes

___UseNames.description: In pattern saving, the PM write attribute names
___UseNames.title: Attribute names writing

___UseInds.description: In pattern saving, the PM write attribute indices as they were used/given
___UseInds.title: Attribute indices writing

$eref.description: A params shared by all Binary Set Pattern Managers. The file is a request for creation of a PM working with sets
$eref.title: Common params for Binary Set Pattern Managers

allOf.description: It is a module and is a Binary Set Pattern Manager

___AttrPosetPath.description: Path to a file with attribute dependendencies given as a poset (sutisfies json schema https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AlekseyBuzmakov/FCAPS/master/FCAPS/schemas/PatternManagerModules/AD.json).
___AttrPosetPath.title: Path to a File with Attribute Dependencies

description: A params of module Binary Set Join Pattern Manager with Dependencies. Dependencies between attributes allows to express when one attribute can appear in a pattern. In particular, if 'a' depends on 'b', then 'a' cannot appera in a pattern that does not contain 'b'. The file is a request for creation of a PM working with sets given as list of attribute numbers with join as a semilattice opperation and dependencies on attributes.
title: Pattern Manager for Binary Set with Join operation and Dependecies
